content:
When publishing logical models, the layout is the same as profiles - includes differential vs snapshot, and extensions
image.png

Does it make sense, or do we want a slightly different rendering for logical models?
Is it even possible to change it, given that they are StructureDefs?
I can task myself to do any needed changes (once I figure out how to include new layouts ), but wanted to ask if it makes sense.

Jose Costa Teixeira said:

Does it make sense, or do we want a slightly different rendering for logical models?

A different rendering would be useful ...see also this https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/Specify.20the.20layout.20to.20be.20used
